Name: Mana Burst
Description: Target makes Agility Check [6+Mystique+Modifier]. On failure, takes 1 Force damage and pushed 2 tiles. (+2/Mana Cost).
Lore: You release a condensed surge of unstable mana that detonates in a focused blast.

Name: Arcane Bolt
Description: Make a ranged spell attack for 1 Force damage. This attack ignores cover. (+2 per Mana Cost).
Lore: A shard of refined mana shoots forth, guided by pure calculation rather than sight.

Name: Displacement
Description: When targeted by an attack, impose Disadvantage on the roll.
Lore: You bend light and position around yourself, appearing slightly out of sync with reality.
